agencies.name: HM Treasury
summary: HM Treasury issued updated guidance on Anti-Money Laundering for financial institutions.

agencies.name: Home Office
summary: Updates on immigration enforcement and supporting AML investigations.
Guidance for collaborating with the NCA on suspicious activity reporting and enforcement.

agencies.name: HMRC

agencies.name: FATF
summary: The FATF will review the UK's AML/CFT framework in the 2027 MER, assessing AMLAR implementation, crypto regulation, and SAR quality.

agencies.name: FCA
summary: FCA released updated guidance on reporting suspicious activity under REP CRIM.
Additional guidance on crypto oversight and payment firms compliance.

agencies.name: OFCOM
summary: OFCOM released guidance on AML obligations for telecom operators.
Emphasis on KYC and monitoring of high-risk transactions.

agencies.name: Trading Standards
summary: Trading Standards issued alerts on emerging consumer fraud schemes.
Campaigns to ensure small businesses comply with AML and payment regulations.

agencies.name: National Trading Standards
summary: National Trading Standards issued guidance for enforcement teams on identifying suspicious activity.
Focus on AML compliance across high-risk sectors.

agencies.name: DWP
summary: DWP issued measures to detect and prevent fraud in welfare payments.
Staff training to improve awareness of AML risks in benefit distribution.
importantDates: 2025-12-20: New fraud prevention measures go live
